description: Plays the song you specified either with a link or the name of the song
Skips to the next song in the server song queue
Pauses the current song playing in the voice channel
Unpauses the current song playing in the voice channel
Clears the server queue and disconnects the bot from the voice channel
Loops the current song playing until Sierra is disconnected or the loop is disabled
Removes the song which is in the specified queue position
Skips you to the specified position in the queue
Searches youtube for a playlist with the corresponding name
Searches soundCloud for a track with the corresponding name
Searches soundCloud for a playlist with the corresponding name
